issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I have found that only certain system metrics are now being shown. After watching the wire I can see that the DescribeSensors response contains metric names that are integers instead of the actual names:

{code}

fields.summary: Sensors reporting incorrect metric name to CLC

comments.body: A fix is in {{dev/dmitrii/EUCA-5718}} (off of 'testing'). It's also deployed on the host where Vic identified the problem. Please, let me know if you'd like me to merge this somewhere.  Feel free to merge it yourself, too.
All metrics are now being displayed.
